Summary: Three separate orbs came from this UFO, slightly north then went vertical at a very high speed.
trends: There have been 78 other sightings in Oklahoma City
There were no other sightings in Oklahoma City on or around September 23rd 2008
divs: Sighting Details From the front porch of my residence myself and my grandsons observed: At approximately 7:30 pm (cst)myself and my three grandsons, two are 11 and my oldest is 14, were watching a bright star that was southwestern horizon. As we all watched the star became dimmer and dimmer until it vanished from sight. Approximately five minutes later, it re-appeared. Looking through binoculars I was able to discern, that instead of one source of light for that star, there in fact three white orbs in a horizontal configuration. One of my grandsons observed three white orbs move in a northerly position and two went up "very fast" while the other went downward also very fast. My grandsons were extremely excited and very curious as to what they had all just witnessed.
